//use item -1 for sell
//sp_cor,201,294,4	marketshop	Bonus 01#01	564,28394:250000:3;

bat_c03,62,125,4	script	CostumeOld#01	564,{
mes "[ Costume old ]";
mes "^FF0000กรุณาเชคน้ำหนัก และ จำนวนของในตัวก่อนดึงสินค้า";
mes "หากไอเท็มหล่นทีมงานจะไม่รับผิดชอบ^000000";
next;
	switch(select("No.1","No.2","No.3","No.4","No.5","No.6","No.7","No.8","No.9","No.10","No.11")) {
		case 1:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO00",1;	break;
		case 2:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO01",1;	break;
		case 3:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO02",1;	break;
		case 4:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO03",1;	break;
		case 5:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO04",1;	break;
		case 6:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO05",1;	break;
		case 7:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO06",1;	break;
		case 8:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO07",1;	break;
		case 9:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO08",1;	break;
		case 10:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO09",1;	break;
		case 11:	sleep2 100;	callshop "CT-SVO10",1;	break;
	}
end;
OnInit: 
waitingroom "    Costume Old",0; 
end;
}

bat_c03,52,119,4	script	Cash สวมใส่#Dif	564,{
mes "[ ^FF0000"+strnpcinfo(1)+"^000000 ]";
mes "นี่คือระบบร้านค้า ออนไลน์";
mes "^24D670  หมวดของสวมใส่^000000";
mes "^FF0000กรุณาเชคน้ำหนัก และ จำนวนของในตัวก่อนดึงสินค้า";
mes "หากไอเท็มหล่นทีมงานจะไม่รับผิดชอบ^000000";
next;
	switch(select("^FF0000^000000 Upper" , "^FF0000^000000 Middle" , "^FF0000^000000 Lower" , "^FF0000^000000 Armor" , "^FF0000^000000 Garment" , "^FF0000^000000 Shoes" , "^FF0000^000000 Shield" , "^FF0000^000000 Accessory")) {
		case 1:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R1",1;	break;
		case 2:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R2",1;	break;
		case 3:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R3",1;	break;
		case 4:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R4",1;	break;
		case 5:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R5",1;	break;
		case 6:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R6",1;	break;
		case 7:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R7",1;	break;
		case 8:	sleep2 100;	callshop "HC-R8",1;	break;
	}
end;
OnInit: 
waitingroom "# ของสวมใส่",0; 
end;
}
